title: Why does my profile background always show Ahri when i rarely play her?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
http://imgur.com/a/Lx9wY match history. 

This is so annoying. I played Xayah a lot recently and would like her to be profile background

replies.body: Hey, I just checked your profile and it looks to be showing DJ Sona.  It's animated too.  :D  The dynamic background should show your most recently played champions (hover over the mask icon on your profile), but it might need a moment to update.  You'll need to play a lot more Xayah games to get that updated, but keep in mind it will continue to change as you play different champions.

Yay it shows Xayah now. Guess all you need to do is play enough games. And i love the DJ sona animated background and i changed my name. Im a Xayah main now. Lucky i got the name of summoner icon as the summoner name.
